CV
My history

I'm currently a masters student researcher at both Universite Paris-Sud and TU-Berlin. At the current moment, I am doing an internship at Xerox Research in the beautiful city of Grenoble.

Previously I was a research intern in the AVIZ group at INRIA-Saclay and in the Global Information Systems group at ETH Zurich.

My broad research area is Human–computer interaction. I’m excited to be a part of research ventures that help extend users capabilities by developing novel tools and techniques.
